affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target, Point Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE: Magical
cmb:
MANA COST: 90/90/90/90
COOLDOWN: 10/9/8/7
desc: Magnus sends out a wave of force, damaging enemy units in a line.
lore: Mt. Joerlak was a somewhat unstable mass, and Magnus has learned to channel its reverberations.
name: magnataur_shockwave

attrib:
DURATION: 40 / 40 / 40 / 40
BONUS DAMAGE: 20% / 30% / 40% / 50%
CLEAVE DAMAGE: 20% / 30% / 40% / 50%
CLEAVE RADIUS: 200
cmb:
MANA COST: 30/40/50/60
COOLDOWN: 12
desc: Gives an allied unit bonus damage and cleave on attack.
notes:
The bonus damage is based only on base damage and damage from primary attributes.
Cleave damage is reduced by armor type but not by armor value.
Cleave damage goes through magic immunity.
Ranged units cannot Cleave.
lore: With a deep bellow, Magnus displays his true power.
name: magnataur_empower

attrib:
SPEED: 950
SLOW DURATION: 2.5
SLOW: 40% / 40% / 40% / 40%
DAMAGE: 70 / 140 / 210 / 280
DISTANCE: 750 / 900 / 1050 / 1200
cmb:
MANA COST: 80/80/80/80
COOLDOWN: 30
desc: Magnus rushes forward, goring enemy units on his massive tusk.  Units hit on the way will be dragged to the destination, then damaged and slowed.
notes:
Creeps aren't considered for the max target cap.
Doesn't affect magic immune units.
lore: Magnoceros horns are valuable in direct proportion to their danger to prospective merchants.
name: magnataur_skewer

attrib:
PULL RADIUS: 410
DAMAGE: 50 / 125 / 200
HERO STUN DURATION: 2.25 / 3 / 3.75
CREEP STUN DURATION: 3 / 4 / 5
cmb:
MANA COST: 200/250/300
COOLDOWN: 120/110/100
desc: Magnus changes properties of matter, sucking all nearby enemies in front of him and stunning them with a powerful slam and dealing damage.
notes: Disable and pull work through magic immunity.
lore: Magnus fights with the fury of the erupting Mt. Joerlak.
name: magnataur_reverse_polarity
